channel.title: Self-Reflection on Wayne的博客
channel.description: Recent content in Self-Reflection on Wayne的博客

item.title: Self reflection: learn by doing: baskbetball, git, collaborate my self-learning assistant AI
item.description:
Basketball 链接到标题

Before my last basketball team practive, I noticed a post talking about how to defense in Ins, in which the words “defense is about prediction, not passive reaction” inspired me. I got 4-5 steals in the team practice after applying this thought. This makes me rethink the things and rules I was told by others and never questioned. I felt stuck in my basketball performance sometimes, which makes me frustrated. What if I try, be willing to fail and try another way? Keep an opern mind, Wayne.

item.title: Self reflection: looking for jobs in hk, learning AI and life
item.description:
2 interviews out of 100 job application 链接到标题

As a former quantum physics research postdoc, I’m looking for jobs in industry to survive in Hong Kong. I start job application on 16 Oct 2025. With not much eager to find a job in this year (some part of me inside still want to gap), only around 100 CVs are submitted, which contains lots of my physics research technical terms because my experience is primarily in research, not industrial settings. Most of the job application are about quant finance or data analysis.
